title: Duration of Invasive Mechanical Ventilation before Veno-Venous ExtraCorporeal Membrane Oxygenation for Covid-19 related Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome: The experience of a tertiary care center
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Charles Vidal, Mathilde Nativel, Bérénice Puech, Florent Poirson, Radj Cally, Laurence Dangers, Eric Braunberger, Julien Jabot, Nicolas Allou, JérômeM Allyn
